translations: 金属镜；反射镜；[医] 窥器

sentences.sentence: Note the edge of the speculum is sharp.
sentences.translation: 注意边缘的窥器是尖锐的。

sentences.sentence: You will be aware of a support (speculum), which helps to hold your eye open.
sentences.translation: 你会感受到一个撑子(扩张器)，它可以保持你的眼睛睁开。

sentences.sentence: Methods: Questionnaires were used to measure the reasons for the comfort changing of 80 cases after inside-nostril speculum operations.
sentences.translation: 方法对80例鼻内窥镜术后病人舒适改变原因进行问卷调查。
